head.supplied: ¶ [Forbes H. O. director Christchurch Museum. That he be presented with certain works. ¶ Works not identified. Forbes had evidently requested M's help in supplying published works. See M to W. Fielde...

div.p: No. 5860, vol. 1891 R, VPRS 1168/P inward correspondence registers, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Letter not found; item is a register entry only, entered on 18 June 1891. The letter was referred to the Premier's Department on 9 June 1891.
[Forbes H. O. director Christchurch Museum. That he be presented with certain works.
Works not identified. Forbes had evidently requested M's help in supplying published works. See M to W. Fielder17 June 1891 (for Victorian naturalist); M to J. Monro, 19 June 1891 (for works not printed by the Government printer).
]
